message: I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product, and I think it's a great opportunity for us to work together. I'm willing to offer it to you for $14000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.

I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I think your initial offer is a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

I understand that $11000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $13000. I believe this is a fair price that takes into account the value you've placed on the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to pay $12200 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
I'm getting closer to your target, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $12500. I think this is a fair price that balances our interests.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

I'm not willing to go below $12500, Bob. I think it's a fair price considering the value I bring to the table. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $12300.
I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to pay $11800 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
